article.title: Harding Security to Provide Biometrics Intelligence in Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Harding Security Associates, McLean, Virginia, was awarded an $11,041,052 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for biometrics intelligence support services. Work will be performed in Charlottesville, Virginia and Afghanistan, with an estimated completion date of Sept. 28, 2012. One bid was solicited, with one bid received. The U.S. Army Intelligence and Security Command, National Ground Intelligence Center, Charlottesville, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
